No Chemical  Processing
Very Tight Curly  hair may be steamed to acheive  texture

Product Description

Hair Type: 3B- 3C
 
Upkeep: High (daily): braid the hair at night to prevent tangling, apply leave –in conditioner daily, detangle hair daily with wide tooth comb or denman brush, use minimal heat, and only apply light serum for moisture.
 
Recommended Products: Sulfate-free products, light serum,Denman Brush, spray bottle, wide tooth comb, and silk scarf/cap

Luster: Medium to Low
 
Lengths: 12″ to 28″
